SQL_STMT_U.val: select CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO from :1/CMON, :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = CMON_ADMNO and CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and CMON_CURRBALSPECIALACC <> 0 and CMON_CLNTNO <> 99999 and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' for fetch only

select CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO from :1/CMON, :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = CMON_ADMNO and CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY and CMON_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE <> 0 and CMON_CLNTNO <> 99999 and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' for fetch only

select CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO from :1/CMON, :1/ADMN, :1/CLNT where ADMN_NO = CMON_ADMNO and CLNT101_ADMNO = CMON_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CMON_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR and CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC <> 0 and CMON_CLNTNO <> 99999 and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' for fetch only

select DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_NO from :1/SSUP, :1/DEBC, :1/DEBB where DEBB_DEBC_NO = SSUP_DEBC_NO and DEBC_NO = SSUP_DEBC_NO and DEBC_FINANCELIMIT >= 0 and DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH > DEBC_FINANCELIMITH and SSUP_FINANCELIMIT is not null for fetch only

select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_NO, INVO_INVOICENO from :1/INVO, :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = INVO_ADMNO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_DUEDATE < ':2' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' for fetch only

select INVO_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_AACTUALH, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AACTUALC from :1/INVO, :1/ADMN, :1/SBUY where ADMN_NO = INVO_ADMNO and SBUY_ADMNO = INVO_ADMNO and SBUY_CLNTNO = INVO_CLNTNO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and INVO_DEBH_NO = :2 and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' and SBUY_AUTOMATICCOLLECTION = 'Y' order by INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: 6a. StoreBTCH
6b. BookOffPreviousOverdueInvo

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_AACTUALH, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AACTUALC from :1/INVO, :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = INVO_ADMNO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_DUEDATE < ':2' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' order by INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO for fetch only
select count(*) from :1/INVO, :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = INVO_ADMNO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_DUEDATE < ':2' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' for fetch only
select count(*) from :1/INVO, :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = INVO_ADMNO and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and INVO_DEBH_NO = :2 and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'Y' for fetch only

Text.val: -- Reset virtuals
-- Calculate v.FACTACCH

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBB join :1/CLNT on CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 join :1/DEBH on :4 and DEBH_DATDELETED is null join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO and DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null where DEBB_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO for fetch only

Text.val: -- V.PERC > GSET_QUANTITY(338)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and exists (select * from :1/CLNT where CLNT101_ADMNO = CMON_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CMON_CLNTNO and CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :5 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :6)

Text.val: --If V.TRADINGLIMIT > V.INGLIMIT + V.DEPOSITS

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (SCPD_INVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SCPD where SCPD_DATE = ':2' and SCPD_TYPE = 4 and SCPD_SCFP_NO = :3 and SCPD_ADMNO = :4
select cast (sum (SCPD_INVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SCPD where SCPD_DATE = ':2' and SCPD_TYPE in (1,2) and SCPD_SCFP_NO = :3 and SCPD_ADMNO = :4

Text.val: ... schedule BSF101
-- First clean MQ318
-- Select deposit participants to check if MQ318 must be written
